# weights

**Instance Property**

Convolution weights.

## Declaration

```swift
var weights: BNNSLayerData
```

## Discussion

This parameter should contain [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/BNNSConvolutionLayerParameters/k_width] `*` [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/BNNSConvolutionLayerParameters/k_height] `*` [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/BNNSConvolutionLayerParameters/in_channels] `*` [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/BNNSConvolutionLayerParameters/out_channels] values.

## Instance Properties

- **activation**: The layer activation function.
- **bias**: Layer bias, one for each output channel.
- **in_channels**: The number of input channels.
- **k_height**: The height of the convolution kernel.
- **k_width**: The width of the convolution kernel.
- **out_channels**: The number of output channels.
- **x_padding**: The X padding.
- **x_stride**: The X increment in the input image.
- **y_padding**: The Y padding.
- **y_stride**: The Y increment in the input image.
